resources.string: This app requires access to many others to work, if you are having issues connecting to a specific app click here (FAKE LINK I HAVE NO CLUE WHAT GOES HERE) If you are having issues with this itself click here. Also in the apps I have looked at on my phone the help pages loads up a webpage? anyway we need to get content for this.

This app was created as a project for a University of Auckland post-graduate Software Engineering paper. It works to combine information to give the user a single view point to find out facts they may need for the day.
Maybe set up an email form here, thats what an android app on my phone has. They provide own email and comments and it goes to an email set up for this app.
